mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select offer.normember_idx idx, offer.offerdate writedate, offer.normal_name subject,to_char(offer.normal_birth,'yyyy') pay_month, TRUNC((sysdate-offer.normal_birth)/365) min_age,offer.normal_gender gender,member.addr period ,offer."CHECK" ref from offer,member where offer.commember_idx=#{idx} and offer.normember_idx=member.idx) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select count(*) from offer where commember_idx=#{idx} and status='활성'

select * from (select o.idx as plan_idx , n.idx,n.subject, n.com_name, n.period, n.writedate, n.pay_hour , n.starttime, n.finishtime , "CHECK" as ref from notice n, offer o where n.idx = o.notice_idx and o.normember_idx = #{member_idx}) where rownum>=#{start} and rownum<=#{end}
select count(*) from offer where normember_idx=#{member_idx} and status='활성'
mapper.update: update offer set "CHECK"=1 where normember_idx = #{member_idx} and idx = #{offer_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from offer where normember_idx=#{nor_idx} and commember_idx=#{com_idx}
